about_the_game:
"Time of the Moon" is a mystery adventure game in the city of "Lunaris", more than 300 years after the sun went out.

It is prepared various attractive characters, the long story like a fantasy novel, RPG turn battle, and puzzles that harmonizes the system of RPG Maker tools.

Reveal the truth of various cases in "Time of the Moon" where a beautiful and dreamy story unfolds.


1. Story
Since the sun with the power of infinite life turned into death, the city "Lunaris" is protected by the moon with the infinite power of creation. And "Stellance", the guardians who protect Lunaris by receiving the power of the stars.

Immediately after becoming Stellance, the main character, Lucas Leo, encounters mysterious incidents ...

2. Game features

Search

Walk around different places to collect the information and tips you need for game. Listen to the stories that the black figures tell you.



Besides, you may be able to see the hidden stories of the characters and other Lunaris' aspects. Everywhere you pass while you settle the case, diverse beings live their own lives in Lunaris.


Puzzle

Lunaris is the place where the moon of creation, resides. Moonlight creates something we can't imagine. What is clear is that Lunaris is full of mysteries beyond our common sense.
Their beings will cast various puzzles to you as you progress through the story. Uncover the truth by solving the mysteries.

Battle



The souleaters was born from the existence of "death" that covered the land before the two creators created the world.
They always lust for soul and eat it wildly.
The only people who can deal with monsters are those who have received the power of the stars from the moon. Defeat the monsters with the main character Leo and protect Lunaris.


Let me invite you to "Time of the Moon," the land where only the moon exists and the stars shine on the world.
detailed_description:
Streaming Rules

You can feel free to stream or monetize the game, but please note that everything after the end of Chapter 3 should be kept secret.

name: Time of the Moon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP / Vista / 7
  • Processor: Any processor w/ a clock rate of 2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: CPU-integrated or on-board graphics
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Any processor w/ a clock rate of 2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: CPU-integrated or on-board graphics
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

short_description: "Time of the Moon," the land where only the moon exists and the stars shine on the world. Discover for yourself the mysterious events that unfold in a fairytale-like, beautiful world.
